data.text: Yesu vaakhuma awe Inupa ya Nlhuku, owiittucha mmoka nkeera, “Owiittuchiha! Nkoonani inupa chi ni malhuku athekelhiye chinre aya worera chiyo!”
Yesu nkaamwakhulha, eeraka, “Nnowoona chi inupa chulhupalhe chi? Khaniwo nlhuku ninottuna uhalha vaa, kila ittu inowa uphomolhiya.”
Yesu aari nakanlhe vachulhu Mwaako wo Mizeituni, miitho anari awehaka Inupa ya Nlhuku, Napeturo ni Nayakhobo ni Nayohana ni Naandorea nkayaawacha unkoha wo ntemera.
“Nkanihimerieni yoyo mwaha uyo unohalha ukhalha iyaakhani? Ni ithikineha chani chinohalha unichuwelhiha wiira uhaatameria?”
Yesu nkaahimiachera eeraka, “Mwiishungeke nhiwe mwaathepiachiya ni ntu.
Anoowa attu enchi aromolhachaka nchina naka eepangaka, Phi mii! Aapoterihaka attu enchi.
Vanottuna inyu wiiwa mwaha wo ikhoto chinaatakaniya vakhiviru ni cho utayi nhithemwe. Chonkhaye chiyo chinowa upangia, nansho ihikhalhaka umalha wo ilhapo.

Makosho anowa waatakana, imwene ni imwene ikina. Ilhapo inowa utikhinyachiya mwonkhaye, attu akelhiyaka ni ikuruna yo woopiha. Chonkhaye chiyo chinowa uholhelha thoko chinera aya nkuri vanoyariaa awe mwaana.

“Nansho mwaattiva nthepeke ukhalha mwiishungaka. Ukhalhawaya nnoowa mwaavariya ni urweehiya umilhatuni. Nnowa waatakachiya mu inupa cho unlhapelha Nlhuku, nnowa weemeshiya wa attu o utawara ni wo mamwene wo nlhatu waka ni uhimiechesha Malhove Orera.
Nansho umalha uhinaaya, Malhove Orera anowa wiittuchihiya wa makosho onkhaye.

Ni vawo vanottuna inyu uvariya ni urweehiya umilhatuni vawo, nhiwe mwoova wiira nnottuna wulhumachani, mmweeke mwolhumacha iriyoothe ivahiye inyu. Ukhalhawaya malhove ayo khanowa ukhalha awinyu, anottuna wuulhumachiya ni Iphumu ya Nlhuku.
Attu anowa waathumiha achihimaya eeviye, manyanaangoro anowa waathumiha achishaana aya. Ashaana ni ayo anowa waathumiha manyanaangoro ni uweeva.
Attu onkhaye anowa uuvengani wo nlhatu waka. Nansho nohalha uvilhelha wo uhoochaa nowa woopolhiya.
“Nnowa woona ‘Nrusho no utanganya’ ninemenlhe vamapuroni vatakatifu.” Noshoma achuwelheke chinohimiya! “Vavawo arii Uyudea attawelheke umiakoni.
Ntu ri vachulhu nchaara no inupa awe, hikhuruwe vathi uukushani ittu.
Ntu ri umatani hihokolhie uwani uukushani ikuwo awe.
Ahothapana manyopani ari ni iweyi ni alhe anaamwiha ashaana yayo mahuku ayo!
Munlhapelheke Nlhuku wiira yayo mahuku ayo ahiwe nlhaalha wo uririya!
Ukhalhawaya uhuva waya unowa uweria chinene vahinapacha woonia toka Nlhuku voopilhe awe ilhapo mpaka nna. Mena khanowa upangia tho.
Nansho Athithi ahokuwukulha yayo mahuku ayo, ihikaari chiicho, khaawo ntu akoopolhiye. Ilha inottuna upangia wo woonelha ikiriri attu athanlhiye, phi chiichammo etu mahuku ayo ahowukulhiya.
“Ni vavawo awaakaru ntu eeraka, ‘Mwooneke, Kuristo ri va!’ Ama ‘Mwooneke rii valhe!’ Nhinrumelhelhe.
Ukhalhawaya ashi kuristo o woothacha ni anamilhohi o woothacha enchi anowa woonia. Anowa upanga cho ushangiha ni ithikineha chinchi wo waapoteriha ata attu athanlhiye ni Nlhuku, yooriaaka.
Nhiittialhe! Kihouhimeriani chi chittu chonkhaye chi mahuku ahinaya uphiya.
“Paahi etu, umalha wo yayo mahuku o uhuva ayo, nchuwa ninowa uhelhiya ipiphi, ni mweeri khunowa waapharelha.
Ittotwa chinowa umora ni machiri o wiirimu anowa utikhinyia.
Vavawo Mwaana a Ntu nowa woonia, awaaka mmahuteni wo ikuru ni nthimicho.
Nowa waaruma minepa o wiirimu avire mithelha ncheshe chonkhaye cho iphioo aakhungurachaka attu athanlhiye ni Nlhuku aviraka uno ni uno.
“Mwiittucheke malhikaaniho o nkhuyu. Vanochokholha aya uphuwa mathaakhuru makithi, vavawo inoochuwania wiira nlhaalha uhaatama.
Wo chiichammo etu, vanohalha inyu woona chiicho, nnowa uchuwelha wiira uwa wo Mwaana a Ntu uhaatama.
Wo ikekhiaye muupuwelheke wiira yayo anowa upangia ilha iyari ilha ihinavira.
Irimu ni ilhapo chinowa uvira, nansho malhove aka mii khanovira mena.
“Khaawo ntu chuwenlhe, chiripothe, iyaakhani au nihuku naani noowa, uchokholha wo minepa cho wiirimu, mena Mwaana, ahikhalhe Athithi anene phi chuwenlhe.
Nshelhelhiheke, nhiittialhe, nlhapelheke ukhalhawaya khanchuwenlhe nihuku naani.
Inowa ukhalha thoko ntu nothama uwannyawe ni urwaa nkwaha wo utayi chinaalhehera awe ni waavaha ikuru anamitheko awe, ni unruma ntu o ushunga inupa awe wiira hiitialhe.
Nkhalheke miitho etu, ukhalhawaya khanchuwenlhe wiira anene inupa anohalha uhokolhia nihuku naani, uchechilho ama uhiyu variyari ama mapikoosha ama wichishu.
Ahokolhiaka wo uhichuwania, ahuuphwanyeni nnarumpe.
Nlhove kinohimiaka uwaninyu mwaattiva, phi nno kinohimiaka wa attu onkhaye, Nshelhelhiheke!”
